info.name: Rackball
info.attribution:
The woodgrain image by David Robarts is available in the Rummy Tiles game on the VirtualTabletop public library.  It is available under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.


The room design, library image, and other room elements are by RogerLipsett and are released to the Public Domain under CC0.
info.description: Using 60 card deck, exchange one card each turn to improve hand. Be first to arrange 10 cards from lowest to highest in hand. First to 500 points wins.
